DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate objective response rate patient advance squamous cell carcinoma esophagus treat carboplatin docetaxel . II . Assess toxicity regimen patient . III . Assess time progression overall survival patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 , follow carboplatin IV 15-30 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month year 2 , every 6 month year 2-5 , annually thereafter death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-35 patient accrue study rate 30 patient per year .
